metadata.name: The Lone Surfer
metadata.description:
I entered the NFT space in Feb 2021 with one clear goal... to sustain Van and Photography life. 

I was binging Clubhouse. And then the magic happened, my first Portrait sold in the March.. I broke free from the norm. 

My Photography business had always centred around portraiture, but there was a creative drive burning inside to head to the coast and shoot Surf.

I had finished up a Photography Job in London then drove 6 hours to the South West of England, North Devon. 

I parked in an inlet on the side of a cliff that overlooked Saunton Sands. I cracked open a cider with the other Van Lifers parked next to me. 

At 5am I woke up to the sound of the waves, poked my head out of the side door and saw a Lone Surfer catching his first break of the day. 

Quickly I grabbed the Camera... the Dream was alive... I was shooting surf... It felt wholesome. 

It would seem fitting that after 1 year in the NFT space I would finally get my Foundation invite and this be the Photograph that I mint.
